alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 12:57PM EDT until October 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees expected. * WHERE...Lackawanna and Luzerne counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest temperatures are expected in the outlying, rural areas.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
